title: Habits of Home (11R165)
text:
Set:	Shadows
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Shire
Twilight:	4
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Toil 2. (For each [Shire] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2.) Bearer must be a Hobbit. Limit 1 per bearer. Each time the fellowship moves from a dwelling or forest site, remove (1).
Rarity:	R
